channel.title: [REQ] How to place NPC`s and let them walk and talk
channel.description:
I`m already searching for a while but i still can`t find a [TUT] off all for this. Can someone give a [TUT] in a reply or give a link to a [TUT]?
I would really apriciate that :)
Regards, P k n 3 w b

item.title: [REQ] How to place NPC`s and let them walk and talk
item.dc:creator: @P_k_n_3_w_b P k n 3 w b
item.description:
@P_k_n_3_w_b wrote:

Ok i want to know when ive maked a npc, how i can let him talk

Regards,

P k n 3 w b

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] How to place NPC`s and let them walk and talk
item.dc:creator: @Liam123 Liam123
item.description:
@Liam123 wrote:

Go to autospawn.cfg.

copy another line of code, enter, paste.

Change the first numbers e.g 2745; to the npc you want.

Then the set of two after that are the co’ords its placed. then the walk type i think. Then the range it walks for. then height, i can’t remember haven’t opened that specific file for a while.

Read full topic
